categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Magellan was an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer under the command of Julias Narn. It was the sole Imperial capital ship in the Trebodar system, as there was only one inhabited planet. Under the command of Julias, it routed out the Galderian pirates' asteroid headquarters, and destroyed their Space ARC Star Cruiser.
In reality, Ferdinand Magellan was the leader of the first expedition to circumnavigate the Earth. Ironically, he never survived the trip himself, dying mid-way through the Pacific.
